Package ktt.lib.httpserver.handler

Class RedirectHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ktt.lib.httpserver.SimpleHttpHandler
      • ktt.lib.httpserver.handler.RedirectHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler, SimpleHttpExchangeAuthenticator
    public class RedirectHandler
extends SimpleHttpHandler
    A request handler that redirects to a different URL without pushing to the history. The URL may not work correctly if it does not have a valid authority (http/https).
    Since:
    01.00.00
    Version:
    02.00.00
    Author:
    Ktt Development
    See Also:
    SimpleHttpHandler, HttpHandler
